text: You're not supposed to be so blind with patriotism that you can't face reality. Wrong is wrong, no matter who says it.
author: Malcolm X

text: Patriotism is your conviction that this country is superior to all others because you were born in it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: It is lamentable, that to be a good patriot one must become the enemy of the rest of mankind.
author: Voltaire

text: We, the People, recognize that we have responsibilities as well as rights that our destinies are bound together that a freedom which only asks what's in it for me, a freedom without a commitment to others, a freedom without love or charity or duty or patriotism, is unworthy of our founding ideals, and those who died in their defense.
author: Barack Obama

text: True patriotism hates injustice in its own land more than anywhere else.
author: Clarence Darrow
